forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 57F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
